channel.title: OldskoolPK - need PI coders
channel.description:
look for: - experienced 317 coders (2) note: when i mean experienced i mean, you have to be able to add items/weapons, add a webclient...etc
I have only just moved into PI sources, so i need someone that could help me code it.
our server has a running VPS.
why should you join us? because we are getting $200 dollar donation to pay for a moparscape sponsorship, plus we are running with a VPS.
[IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/image.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i910.photobucket.com/albums/ac308/garfdore/22.jpg[/img]
Please write a comment if your interesed, talking about what can you do to help us.
if you are interested please add my email: rsps-helpdesk@hotmail.com
many thanks, Luis

item.title: OldskoolPK - need PI coders
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

317 projects nowadays are just kids wanting to take credit for a team of developers’ they “hire” to do it for them. This is why I work alone, and do 621+ development.

Amen. I hope one day I can change everyones perspective on 317’s. :o

Read full topic

item.title: OldskoolPK - need PI coders
item.dc:creator: @Orangebob21 Orangebob21
item.description:
@Orangebob21 wrote:

[quote=“oldskoolpk, post:1, topic:374963”]look for:

  • experienced 317 coders (2)
    note: when i mean experienced i mean, you have to be able to add items/weapons, add a webclient…etc

I have only just moved into PI sources, so i need someone that could help me code it.

our server has a running VPS.

why should you join us? because we are getting $200 dollar donation to pay for a moparscape sponsorship, plus we are running with a VPS.

Please write a comment if your interesed, talking about what can you do to help us.

if you are interested please add my email: rsps-helpdesk@hotmail.com

many thanks, Luis[/quote]

So… you’re new to PI and you want fully experienced coders to do all the work? And by adding weapons do you mean making models for them or just adding server and client sided?

Read full topic

item.title: OldskoolPK - need PI coders

item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Try to make an actual development team thread, or I’ll have to lock this.
